nodes.text: The Hieroprince's Ascension was an event marked by the Opaline Creed, a religious faction based on the Outer Rim world Crucival during the time of the Galactic Empire. The event was based around the Hieroprince, an individual in the Creed's religion. During the eve of the Hieroprince's Ascension, Pira Ten, a member of the Creed, was punished by others in the Creed for misreading doctrines. Hazram Namir, her friend in the Creed, shared his bowl of the Creed's bread pudding with her after the encounter.
The Hieroprince's Ascension was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
